segments.advisor_message: So, regarding your monthly expenses, we have that your mortgage payment is around fifteen hundred. Does that still hold, or have there been changes?
segments.client_message: Uh, you know, I was thinking, it might actually be closer to sixteen hundred now. I just refinanced and forgot to update that, sorry about that.

segments.advisor_message: No problem at all! And how about your car insurance? Is that still about a hundred twenty-five per month?
segments.client_message: Actually, I just checked and I think it’s gone up to about a hundred forty a month now. So, yeah, that’s a change too.
